mapper.select: SELECT p.post_no, u.user_no, u.user_nick, u.profile_image, p.text_content, p.post_date, p.like_cnt , p.comment_cnt ,p.post_link FROM giggledbaws.post p LEFT JOIN giggledbaws.user u ON u.user_no = p.user_no WHERE p.post_no > 0 AND u.user_nick LIKE CONCAT('%' , #{keyword} , '%') OR p.text_content LIKE CONCAT('%' ,#{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY p.post_date desc;
